verbs.description: [ARG0: Vice President Mike Pence] [V: named] [ARG1: Keith Kellogg] [ARG2: as his top national security aide] , [ARGM-TMP: after the previous candidate for the post withdrew amid reports that President Donald Trump was angered over his role in anti - Trump attack ads] .
